import React from 'react' import styles from './layout.module.css' import cn from 'classnames' import useWindowSize from '../components/hooks/use-window-size' import Left from '../components/main/left' import Center from '../components/main/center' import Right from '../components/main/right' function Layout({children}) { return (
Left
{children}
{ size.width >980 && Right}
) } export default Layout
